meanings.definition: Characterized by peculiar or unexpected traits.
meanings.sent1: The quirkyish cat always slept in the sink.
meanings.sent2: Her quirkyish sense of fashion made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The quirkyish hat she wore to the party had everyone talking.
meanings.sent4: His quirkyish taste in music was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The quirkyish painting on the wall caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The quirkyish student always sat in a different desk each day.
meanings.sent2: His quirkyish habits included talking to plants for good luck.
meanings.sent3: The quirkyish way she danced at the party was entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The quirkyish squirrel in the park seemed to be posing for photos.
meanings.sent5: The quirkyish bird chirped a unique tune every morning.

meanings.definition: Having a distinctive or eccentric style.
meanings.sent1: The quirkyish artist painted with bright colors and bold strokes.
meanings.sent2: Her quirkyish taste in home decor was admired by all her friends.
meanings.sent3: The quirkyish car he drove turned heads wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: The quirkyish building stood out among the traditional architecture.
meanings.sent5: The quirkyish outfit she wore to the event was a conversation starter.
